page.title: 13An old inhabitant.(Baston)
page.content: He has lived in Baston for 68 years.He used to drive lorries.He used to come to this school and he got bullied.There were three classroooms.The toilets were outside.There was an elm tree where the staff room is now.People left at fourteen.He used to get 50p pocket money.The telephone on Main Street wasn't there it was in the Post Office so if you wanted to ring up at night you coudn't.The village shop used to be a bakers shop.He lives down St.Johns Close.He used to live in a cottage down Main Street for a year but they all got knocked down.During the war it was quiet in Baston.He likes to read now and watch motor racing and he goes to the fete in the village.He likes living in Baston with his family and friends.
